features: 80 micro perforated white papers with 7 mm (0.28 inch) college ruled lines, bound with double wire binding system
252 mm x 168 mm (9.92 inch x 7.05 inch) after detached, a little smaller than B5 size sheet
Blank header with DATE/NO. and TITLE, 30 lines per page divided into 3 sections
Premium quality, 80g/m2 acid free, made in Japan
body.description: Maruman’s B5 sized special purpose notebook is perfect to use as a day planner or a task planner for managing your schedule or organizing projects. Well designed with professional mind, this stylish memopad also serves well as an executive notebook and a professional notebook for your business life. Convenient sized notepad is easy to carry around in your purse or briefcase for checking to do list or writing ideas and plans wherever you are. This versatile writing pad features 80 micro perforated white papers with 7 mm college ruled light gray lines. Page includes 30 lines and divided into three sections by a bold line (10 lines per section) which makes note taking easy and well organized. Each page has a blank header with DATE/NO. and TITLE for quick and easy reference of your note at a glance. It measures 252 mm x 168 mm after detached, a little smaller than B5 size sheet. Firmly bound with quality double wire binding system that allows pages to completely lay flat with both left and right pages lining up evenly when open. This allows you to use both pages as one continuous page across the twin wire when you need a wider space. Durable poly hard cover will stand up to rigorous daily use. Maruman’s premium quality, 80g/m2 acid free papers are made in Japan with their uncompromising commitment to its quality to promise a superior smooth writing with minimal ghosting and bleed-through. Mnemosyne, named after the Greek goddess of memory, comes in a variety of sizes and styles, which is ideal to use as executive journal, business notebook, idea journal, idea notebook, weekly planner and log book, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Highly Functional Notebook with a Chic Simple Design Cover is made of durable resin to protect and prevent pages from bending. Sturdy cover makes it easy to write in your notebook while on-the-go. Convenient rounded corners of the notebook will help prevent corners from getting caught in your bag. Mnemosyne notebooks are created with functional ideas to make these as user-friendly as possible. Japanese stationery manufacturer offer unique useful ideas and always keeping users convenience in mind.

Double Wire Binding and Perforated Papers Securely bound with quality double wire binding system. Made so pages lay completely flat with both pages lining up evenly when open. Pages turn smoothly without catching on the wires. Paper has very fine perforation lines for a clean and easy detach. You can file it with other documents or scan and digitize handwritten materials. Smooth cutting lines will give your detached sheet a clean and professional look when you hand it out.

Premium Quality, Japan-Made Writing Papers Japan-made, premium quality writing papers are used for all Mnemosyne notebooks. With their uncompromising commitment to its quality, it promises a superior smooth writing with minimal ghosting and bleed-through. Just the right thickness for excellent durability. Quality paper will keep its crispness even after separated into a single sheet. Bold lines divide each page into sections for easy organizing. Each page has a blank header with DATE/NO. and TITLE for quick and easy referencing of your note at a glance. Three guide marks on the first and last line on the page will help creating vertical margin lines to separate the page for remarks, check box, and content columns, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Paper, Great Options and Design
reviews.reviewText: Mnemosyne notebooks are great for many reasons:-the paper is fantastic quality and wonderful to use with my fountain pens; he is pleased with using pencil or other pens on the paper. It just is a smooth, clean paper of a nice weight with great hand. He’s not keen on how thin some papers are (looking at you, Tomoe River), and I dislike thick sheets for myself. We are both pleased with notebooks in this line!- they offer several different styles, so you can get blank, dot grid, graph or lined! There are even notebooks with blank on one side and dot etc on the other- different sizes- spiral bound is available at top or side- because of the firm plastic cover and back, your notebook is well protected.Japanese paper tends to be high quality and both the paper and construction of the notebooks themselves do not disappoint.We tried to find this configuration out and about at a local store, but lined seems to be a less popular option these days, so we found it here. It was well priced and always nice not to have to pay shipping on a small order that wouldn’t otherwise meet minimum at a niche shop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t go back
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using these notebooks for college for a couple quarters now. They’re very good quality and well made, and the paper is just perfect. It’s nice and smooth, has a nice white shade, so no transparent streaks and inconsistencies.The build quality is top notch, I have many months old notebooks that still look and feel new.The writing experience on these notebooks is just immaculate. It makes taking notes a pleasant experience, especially with good quality pens. Even pencils feel so much better on these, they don’t scrape, but sort of glide and just feel so nice to write with.I used a regular notebook after a while of using the maruman ones, and I was surprised at how much worse they are, I don’t think I could ever go back.Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Graphic Design College Students
reviews.reviewText: I'm a huge fan of this, bought it as a one off because I didn't have time to go to the Blick to get a new sketchbook before classes started. Will absolutely be buying again...and again...and again.Dot grid layout is in 1mm sections, that's my only "downside" given that I'm in America and we're afraid of base-10 numerical systems for some reason.Otherwise, writing in it (using a 0.5mm mechanical pencil and a 0.5mm Archival Ink Micron) has been a dream. My lines are clean and drawing on it feels incredibly smooth, especially with a pen. Eraser marks are a bit more obvious on this paper than "standard" sketchbook paper, but sketching light and using a polymer eraser seem to be decent.There is no bleed through from front to back page whatsoever. Because of this, the pages definitely have a decent weight to them, but still tear out easily. Since the paper is much smoother than standard sketchbook paper, it does have a small amount of smudge when drawing with an ink pen - but it's barely noticeable given how quick the dry time is.Overall, if you can snag this while it's on sale - you may as well buy a few. Great value overall, I do wish it had a higher page count option, but it's great for semester work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST ring bound notebook--but be wary of shipping.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about these notebooks is just... it's great. Really wonderful quality, well made, a pleasure to use and carry and look at. The paper can handle actual fountain pens, and I like to use it for pen and ink sketches. The surface is silky smooth and the show through is very very minimal, with no bleed at all that I've encountered yet.But, the last one I ordered from here was an A4 size and shipped in a super flimsy envelope. It arrived with an unfixable crease that went through all of the pages, and the binding had been bent badly enough that I couldn't fix it. Not to the point of making it sturdy and comfortable to use, at any rate.The quality of these notebooks is stellar, and the prices I've seen here are really good. But sometimes it may be in your interest to order from a seller who will pack them with more care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highest quality - The only notebook I buy now.
reviews.reviewText: Why buy cheap garbage notebooks that don’t last, when you grab superior quality for a little bit more money? Most mass produced notebooks that you get from office stores are terrible because the pages are thin, they tear easily, and the spine unravels ruining everything. It’s like they don’t care about you or quality.This notebook however, has sturdy yet aesthetically pleasing pages, sturdy spine, sturdy cover, looks better than 90% of all of the other notebooks. Also the pages can be torn cleanly into perfectly sized pages that will fit perfectly into a printer, or with other documents when you need to staple. It’s the Bugatti of notebooks, even my college professor admired it. It’s the only notebook I buy now, no other notebooks come close.Do you want to be the person with a weak, boring notebook or do you want to be the person with a sturdy, sexy, high quality notebook that you know is will outlive the others five times over while gaining you compliments?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice everywhere except for the binding
reviews.reviewText: I'm not heavily invested into the quality of paper for this notepad--I just use it for writing down my daily goals, and occasional journaling. That being said, it's one of the loveliest pieces of paper I've ever written on. The paper is durable, writing is easy, and the faint, grey, lined ruling works so well with the stuff I do. My major complaint, however, would be the binding. For the first ~5 months out of the ~7 it's been in use, the twin wires at the top haven't been hasslesome to deal with. But currently, anyone can notice that all the wires tilt slightly to the left. The wires at the top-left corner have also exited the little square slots in which they go, and I had to manually put them back. The functionality of the steno pad didn't change, but I might in the future. If you intend to take this notepad through rough conditions, I recommend you seek a different product. Also the lower back ends of the pad has become a bit dog-eared, but that's probably because I kept this Steno Pad in a backpack.
It got plenty of space on each day, got great inbetween months pages for notes and stays clean all day long.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good to see something done so well.
reviews.reviewText: Amazon may have worked with Maruman directly to have this 1/4" special/limited production, and it is a brilliant new product. This more natural spacing allows for better use of the paper bc you dont have to always leave an empty line between writing. it's optional and up to you. The original 5mm square/grid sizing meant leaving empty rows when you wished you didnt have to. So... very happy someone finally did this new version so well.Now, if Amazon continues to raise the price to what they originally listed, i think buyers remorse will become much higher. i was glad to buy a bunch of these with reduced pricing that Amazon finally offered. I hope the increase in sales will convince them to not jack up the price -- because using an overpriced commodity never feels good.

The reason I like them the best i s because the paper is smooth. I use it with Uni-ball Signo 307 and the pen just slides on the paper. I also like the subtle perforations on every page, which makes it easier to tear them. It's made in Japan as well, so what's not to like. Highly recommend Maruman.
O caderno é realmente bom. Capa de plástico resistente e papel de alta qualidade, principalmente se você usa canetas tinteiro.

Tardé mucho eligiendo la libreta que quería, pero al final opté por esta, y es perfecta, me encanto, el tamaño es ideal, la llevo conmigo a todos lados, es ligera y las hojas son de buena calidad, súper recomendada. Por fin tengo mis notas en un mismo lugar.
